description: This file defines a data service module for a mechanic portal, handling user authentication, request management, and local storage interactions, with optional integration with Supabase backend.

methods.name: createRequest
methods.description: Creates a new service request, either via Supabase or local storage.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Authenticates a user via Supabase or local mock data.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Logs out the current user, clearing session data.

methods.name: getCurrentUser
methods.description: Retrieves the current authenticated user information.

methods.name: listUnassignedRequests
methods.description: Lists requests not assigned to any mechanic.

methods.name: listMyAssignments
methods.description: Lists requests assigned to a specific mechanic.

methods.name: getRequestById
methods.description: Fetches a request by its ID.

methods.name: acceptRequest
methods.description: Assigns a mechanic to a request and adds an acceptance note.

methods.name: updateRequestStatus
methods.description: Updates the status of a request and appends a note.

methods.name: isSupabaseConfigured
methods.description: Checks if Supabase environment variables are set.
